title: 148863048.small Wonder
excerpt: How much pleasure can you get from a chestnut? Or a text editor? Or a visit to your dentist, market, or local cafe?

children.text: How much pleasure can you get from a chestnut? Or a text editor? Or a visit to your dentist, market, or local cafe?
How much happiness can you get out of ordinary things...or imagining things?
It stands to reason that the skill of deriving pleasure, gratefulness--joy even--from the simplest and most accessible of things is a luxury in and of itself.
Far better than having to spend more on more stuff to fulfill a never ending need.
